ValidationRule.description: Prevent Service Lead creation before first User provisioning
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Create_Service_Lead__c,'Yes'), OR( Provision_First_User_Is_Complete_Flag__c = FALSE , ISBLANK(Account__c), ISBLANK(Services_Lead_Last_Name__c), ISBLANK( Services_Lead_Email__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(Service_Lead__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Service Lead cannot be created until the First User has been provisioned and Service Lead details provided
